attributes.action: Stop the Mega Mosque, please help by signing up, so will can use the money for the people affected in the floods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to remind the people of the United Kingdom that we do have a say what is built. Specailly if it comes out of are pockets for a religion. so sign up to stop the 100 million pound Mega Mosque!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
